Mythos.name: The Story Continues...
Mythos.description: I cannot remember, I must not remember what I saw on that dark and foreboding night

Mythos.name: The Story Continues...
Mythos.description: I cannot remember, I must not remember what I saw on that dark and foreboding night
A rusty train in Arkham, disgorging 2 monsters into the Northside streets
Mythos.name: Terror at the Train Station

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Uptown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: PrivateSecurity Hired in Uptown!

Mythos.description: All Dark Young in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise terror level by 1.
Mythos.name: Goat-like Creature Spotted in Woods!

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Rivertown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Rivertown Residents Take Back Streets!

Mythos.description: An old basement is opened, releasing 2 monsters into the Easttown streets.
Mythos.name: Slum Murders Continue!

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Easttown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Gangs Clean Up Easttown!

Mythos.description: All investigators in jail are released. No investigators may be arrested until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
Mythos.name: Blue Flu!

Mythos.description: All Gugs and Nightgaunts in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.
Mythos.name: Bizarre Dreams Plague Citizens!

Mythos.description: A Silver Lodge ritual lets 2 monsters loose in the French Hill streets.
Mythos.name: Lodge Member Held for Questioning!
Merchants March on Crime!
Mythos.description: All monsters in the Merchant Dist. Streets or locations are returned to the cup.
An ancient stone is disturbed by the construction, releasing 2 monsters into the Miskatonic U. streets
Mythos.name: Horror at Groundbreaking!

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Downtown streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Vigilante Guards the Night!

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Sky and Outskirts are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Big Storm Sweeps Arkham!

Mythos.description: All Dimensional Shamblers and Hounds of Tindalos in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.
Mythos.name: Scientist Warns of Dimensional Rift!

Mythos.description: The terror level increases by 1 in light of this tragic news.
Mythos.name: Family Found Butchered!

Mythos.description: Any investigator with Whiskey must pass a Sneak(-1) check or get arrested and taken to the Police Station. If this occurs they must discard their Whiskey. In addition, Hibb"s Roadhouse is closed until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
Mythos.actions: if not PassSneakCheck() then ArrestPlayer(), TakeAllOfPlayersWisky()
Mythos.name: Temperence Fever Sweeps City!

Mythos.description: The festival has begun! Cultists and Byakhee have their toughness increased by 1.
Mythos.name: The Festival
City Gripped by Blackouts!
Mythos.description: The General Store, Curiositie Shoppe, and Ye Olde Magick Shoppe are closed until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
Star Spawn and Maniacs have their toughness increased by 1. The difficulty to seal or close gates to R"lyeh is increased by 1.
Mythos.name: R"lyeh Rising

Mythos.description: All Undead monsters have their toughness increased by 1.
Mythos.name: The Chill of the Grave

Mythos.description: Ghouls, Formless Spawns, Shoggoths, and Flying Polyps have their toughness increased by 1.
Mythos.name: Things of Darkness

Mythos.description: An ancient ghost ship arries in Arkham, releasting 2 monsters into the Merchant Dist. streets.
Mythos.name: Ghost Ship Docks by Itself!
Black Magic
Mythos.description: Investigators who end their movement in Rivertown streets may choose to delve into dark mysteries using their life force. They roll dice equal to their current Stamina, and for every failed die, they lose 1 Stamina. If this reduces them to 0 Stamina, they are devoured and the player must start a new character. Otherwise, they gain 3 Clue tokens.
All Undead monsters have their toughness increased by 1.
Mythos.name: The Chill of the Grave

Mythos.description: Investigators cannot gain Stamina except by recieving medical care in St. Mary"s Hospital (or from Vincent Lee).
Mythos.name: A Strange Plague

Mythos.description: Investigators cannot gain Sanity except by receiving psychiatric care at Arkham Asylum (or from Carolyn Fern).
Mythos.name: Dreams of a Sunken City

Mythos.description: Luck checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus
Mythos.name: Blackest Night

Mythos.description: Due to the interference of the solar eclipse, no spells may be cast.
Mythos.name: Solar Eclipse

Mythos.description: Thanks to the mystic energy generated by the planetary alignment, all spells have a Sanity cost of 0.
Mythos.name: Planetary Alignment

Mythos.description: It costs 2 fewer Clue tokens to seal gates.
Mythos.name: Noden"s Favor

Mythos.description: Gates cannot be sealed, although they can still be closed.
Mythos.name: No One Can Help You Now

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Southside streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Church Group Reclaims Southside!

Mythos.description: The Library Administration Building, and Science Building are all closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in playuntil then to indicate this.
Mythos.name: Strange Lights on Campus!
The Terrible Experiment
Mythos.description: When this card enters play, place 5 monsters from the cup on it. Any player may choose to fight one or more of these monsters while in the Miskatonic U. streets during the Arkham Encounters Phase. If defeated, they are claimed as monster trophies. These monsters do not move, are not considered to be on the board, and do not count against the monster limit.

Mythos.name: Good Work Undone
Mythos.description: When this card enters play, place 6 Clue tokens on it. Any player may spend Clue tokens during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Easttown streets to discard Clue tokens from this card on a 1-for-1 basis.

Mythos.name: Feds Raid Arkham!
Mythos.description: All monsters in the streets are returned to the cup.

Mythos.name: Egyptian Exhibit Visits Miskatonic U.
Mythos.description: Any investigator who ends his movement in the Miskatonic U. streets may pass a Lore(-1) check to gain 1 Clue token by reading the strange heiroglyphics on the artifacts in the exhibit.

Mythos.name: Alien Technology
Mythos.description: Mi-Go have their toughness increased by 2. If an investigator passes a Combat Check gainst a Mi-Go, he draws 1 extra Unique Item.

Mythos.name: Darke"s Carnival Arrives
Mythos.description: Investigators who end their movement in the Northside streets gain 1 Clue token from the sinister wonders they witness, but must pass a Will(-1) check or lose 1 Sanity.
The Sheldon Gang disturbs a burial mound, releasing 2 monsters into Uptown streets
Mythos.name: Sheldon Gang Turns to Police for Aid!
Estate Sale
Mythos.description: Investigators who end their movement in the Uptown streets may draw 2 Unique items and purchase one, none, or both of them at list price, discarding any that are not purchased.

Mythos.name: Curfew Enforced
Mythos.description: Any investigator who ends his movement in the streets must pass a Will (+0) check or be arrested and taken to the Police Station.

Mythos.name: Happy Days are Here Again
Mythos.description: Due to the renewed prosperity that has come to Arkham, the terror level cannot increase.
A careless picnicker unleashes 2 monsters on the Downtown streets.
Mythos.name: Picnickers Panic!

Mythos.description: Each player may pass a Luck (-1) check to be Blessed.
Mythos.name: All Quiet in Arkham!

Mythos.description: All monsters in locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Manhunt in Arkham

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Miskatonic U. streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Campus Security Increases

Mythos.description: However, the press is mistaken, and the murders were caused by 2 monsters that are released into the Southside streets.
Mythos.name: Southside Strangler Suspected

Mythos.description: All monsters in the Northside streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Police Step Up Patrols in Northside!

Mythos.description: All Chthonians and Dholes in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.
Mythos.name: Strange Tremors Cease!

Mythos.description: An ancient curse strikes Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Rivertown streets.
Mythos.name: Witch Burning Anniversary!

Mythos.description: All investigators in Other World areas may immediately return to Arkham.
Mythos.name: Strange Power Flux Plagues City!

Mythos.description: Fight checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Lore checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Fire Vampires have their toughness increased by 1.
Mythos.actions: ModifyCheck("fight", -1) and ModifyCheck("lore", 1) and ModifyTraitOf("fire vampire", "toughness", 1)
Mythos.name: Heatwave

Mythos.description: All investigators currently in lost in time and space immediately return to Arkham, appearing in a street or location of their choice.
Mythos.name: Missing People Return!

Mythos.description: Will checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Fliers do not move.
Mythos.name: An Evil Fog

Mythos.description: Speed checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty, and players receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Return any Fire Vampires in play to the cup. If a Fire Vampire enters play, return it to the cup and draw a different monster.
Mythos.actions: ModifyCheck("speed", -1) and ModifyMovement(1) and ModifyCheck("sneak", 1) and ReturnToCupMonstersType("fire vampire")
Mythos.name: Raining Cats and Dogs

Mythos.description: Investigators receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase. Fast monsters move like normal monsters.
Mythos.name: Icy Conditions

Mythos.description: Any Elder Things perviously claimed as monster trophies by players return to life and are placed in the River Docks.
Mythos.name: Miskatonic Arctic Expedition Returns!

Mythos.description: The first player must pass a Luck (-1) check or be Cursed.
Mythos.name: Ill Wind Grips Arkham!

Mythos.description: All monsters in the French Hill streets or locations are returned to the cup.
Mythos.name: Lodge Members Watch the Night!
